title: Growing up in New Guinea
brief_description: Looks at the lives the three indigenous New Guinea families through the eyes of a child from each family. The families range from stone-age primitive to partially civilised and fully civilised.
description: Looks at the lives the three indigenous New Guinea families through the eyes of a child from each family. The families range from stone-age primitive to partially civilised and fully civilised.
